bio: He fits snugly on your head then devours your memories. It can be nice to forget the bad ones... or to just wear a hat.

soultimate.name: Wuwuzzat?
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Drops foe's Defense by 40% for 30 seconds.
soultimate.description: Foes' defense is greatly decreased for a time.

name: Wazzat
